scripts.clean: node -e "import { rmSync } from 'fs'; try { rmSync('docs/.observablehq/cache', { recursive: true, force: true }); } catch(e) {} try { rmSync('temp-set-list-drums', { recursive: true, force: true }); } catch(e) {} try { rmSync('temp-pit-data', { recursive: true, force: true }); } catch(e) {}"
scripts.build:apps: echo 'Building all apps...' && npm run build:set-list-drums && npm run build:pit-data
